content:
I am currently a lecturer at the school of computing and information technology at University of Wollongong. Prior to joining UOW, I was a postdoc researcher at The University of Hong Kong, hosted by A/Prof. Man Ho Au. I received my PhD at Shandong University in 2019, advised by Prof. Qiuliang Xu.
I am interested in theoretical and applied cryptography, including:
 Lattice-Based Cryptography   Cryptographic Watermarking   Privacy-Preserving Protocols   Public Key Encryption   Foundation of Cryptography  [Google Scholar | DBLP]

I am interested in theoretical and applied cryptography, including: Lattice-Based Cryptography Cryptographic Watermarking Privacy-Preserving Protocols Public Key Encryption
title: Rupeng Yang (杨如鹏)
